job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
We are currently looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer.
We have one open position. Please apply and we can discuss!

Location: San Francisco
Salary: $150,000 (+/- depending on experience)
Benefits: Full benefits
Type: Full Time, Direct Hire
Sponsorship Available: Yes

Most Important
  • 5+ years overall experience
  • 3+ years w/ Machine Learning (NLU/NLP)
  • Proficient Python


Responsibilities
  • Build an maintain the SaaS application platform
  • Design, implement and maintain functionality and enhancements of the Application
  • Play a leading role in all phases of software development from planning, designing, implementation, testing, deployment, to day-to-day operations


Must Have Skills
  • 5+ years of overall experience with at least 3 in Machine Learning
  • Python experience
  • Experience w/ reinforcement learning
  • Experience w/ AWS, GCP, and or Azure

If the above seems like a fit, then apply!!

CRB Workforce, LLC provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.
This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.
